<sim>.name: Sim
<sim>.info: She is a veteran actress known for her charismatic presence and deep emotional expression. Her warm smile contrasts with her strong, commanding roles on screen.

<suhwan>.name: Suhwan
<suhwan>.info: He often brings levity to the screen with his comedic timing and approachable personality. His signature glasses and sincere demeanor make him a memorable presence.

<lim>.name: Lim
<lim>.info: With a youthful and sincere look, he brings realism and relatability to his roles. His office-style portrayal highlights everyday charm and depth.

<wook>.name: Wook
<wook>.info: He gives off a composed and intellectual aura, often seen in professional or office settings. His subtle smile and clean-cut appearance suggest quiet confidence and thoughtfulness.
